overview: Yael Gavish is the co-founder and CEO of Lifesta.com, a marketplace where people can buy and sell deals from daily deal sites. Yael has extensive marketing, strategy and transaction experience from her prior work as an engagement manager at McKinsey & Company’s Retail and Private Equity practices. Before McKinsey, Yael managed engineering projects for wireless device manufacturers and operators at Sun Microsystems. Yael holds a BA and an MSc in Computer Science from the Technion, Israeli Institute of Technology, and an MBA from the Wharton School.

degrees.institution: The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania
